SELECT
h.id as id_horario, h.dia as dia_horario,
hs.hora as hora
FROM BR_HORARIO as h left join BR_HORA as hs on h.id_hora=hs.id
WHERE h.id=#{id_horario} and h.dia=#{dia_horario}

SELECT
h.id as id_horario, h.dia as dia_horario,
hs.id as id_hora, hs.dia as dia_hora, hs.hora as hora
FROM BR_HORARIO as h left join BR_HORA as hs on h.id_hora=hs.id
WHERE h.id=#{id_horario} dia

SELECT
h.id as id_horario, h.dia as dia_horario,
hs.hora as hora
FROM BR_HORARIO as h left join BR_HORA as hs on h.id_hora=hs.id
ORDER by h.id
